message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $120 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $140. This is still a great deal for you, and it's a fair price for me.
I'm still interested in the product, but $140 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer.
